Class VmSchedulerDRFMH

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RdaUserAwareVmScheduler

    public class VmSchedulerDRFMH
extends org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmSchedulerTimeShared
implements RdaUserAwareVmScheduler
    TODO: This is only an example class, with a possible implementation of multi host DRF algorithm. Currently there are no differences observable to the VmSchedulerDRF for only one hosts. The concept for such an algorithm has to be developed and than implemented in this class.
    Author:
    Patrick A. Taddei
    See Also:
    MaxMinAlgorithm
